overview_of_class:
Chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements, and atomic spectroscopy. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments. Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 151-0 lecture course.

Prerequisite: Permission of the Chemistry Department by placement exam.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.
name: Accelerated General Chemistry Laboratory 1
title: WCAS CHEM 161-0-01 Accelerated General Chemistry Laboratory 1
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for CHEM 151-0. Add both classes (CHEM 151-0 & 161-0) to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Permission of the Chemistry Department by placement exam.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.

Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 151-0 lecture course.
Enrollment in 10AM Chem 161-0 requires enrollment in 10AM Chem 151-0.
